long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Procure Application integration with SimPRO.

Under Catalogue Screen, the users can check the current available stock from a particular supplier branch.

Under Quotation Screen, the users can update the quotation prices for each catalogue item to reflect the current price under their account from a specific supplier.

Under Purchase Order Screen, the users can check the current available stock, price and can directly order from SimPRO to a specific supplier with a single click of a button without going out of the SimPRO application.
